1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using the BarberX Legal Tech platform (“Platform”), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service (“Terms”). If you do not agree, you may not use the Platform.

These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Faith Frontier Ecclesiastical Trust (doing business as “BarberX Legal Technologies”) (“Company”, “we”, “us”, or “our”).

2. Service Description

BarberX Legal Tech is a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) platform providing AI-powered evidence analysis tools:

SaaS Platform Features (All Tiers)

  • Body-worn camera (BWC) video transcription (cloud-based)
  • Speaker identification and diarization
  • Named entity extraction
  • Discrepancy detection and timeline building
  • Document processing and analysis
  • API access (Professional/Enterprise tiers only)

Deployment Models

Free & Professional Tiers: SaaS only (https://app.barberx.info)

  • All processing occurs on our secure cloud infrastructure
  • Evidence files are encrypted, processed, and automatically deleted after analysis
  • You access results through our web application
  • No downloads, no installations, no IT management required

Enterprise Tier: Choice of SaaS or Self-Hosted

  • SaaS: Same as Professional with unlimited usage and premium support
  • Self-Hosted: Deploy on your own infrastructure with full source code access
    • Requires separate Enterprise Self-Hosted License (minimum $75,000/year)
    • All processing occurs on your servers
    • Full control over data storage and retention
    • Subject to additional licensing restrictions

6. Data Privacy and Security

6.1 SaaS Platform Processing (Free & Professional)

  • Evidence files uploaded to our secure cloud infrastructure
  • End-to-end encryption (TLS 1.3 in transit, AES-256 at rest)
  • Zero-knowledge architecture - We encrypt before viewing
  • Files automatically deleted after analysis (24 hours Free, 30 days Professional)
  • No training data - Your files never used for AI model training
  • SOC 2 Type II compliant infrastructure
  • HIPAA/CJIS ready for covered entities

6.2 Enterprise Self-Hosted Processing

  • All processing occurs on your infrastructure
  • Evidence files never leave your network
  • You control all storage, retention, and deletion policies
  • Full audit logs provided
  • We provide software updates only

6.3 Account Data We Collect (All Tiers)

  • Email address, name, organization (registration)
  • Analysis metadata (filename, case number, timestamps - NOT file contents)
  • Usage statistics (analyses count, storage used)
  • API request logs (Professional/Enterprise only)
  • Payment information (processed by Stripe, not stored by us)

6.3 How We Use Account Data

  • Provide and improve the Platform
  • Process payments and enforce usage limits
  • Send service notifications and updates
  • Comply with legal obligations

6.4 Data Sharing

We do NOT sell your data. We may share account data only:

  • With service providers (hosting, payment processing) under strict confidentiality
  • When required by law (subpoena, court order)
  • To protect our rights or investigate abuse

6.5 Data Retention

  • Active accounts: Retained while account is active
  • Deleted accounts: Purged within 30 days
  • Legal compliance: May retain as required by law

6.6 Your Rights

  • Access your account data
  • Request data deletion (account closure)
  • Export your analysis metadata
  • Opt out of marketing emails (service emails required)

See our Privacy Policy for complete details.
